This is a testharness.js-based test.
[FAIL] sanitizer.allowAttribute() with global attributes
  assert_true: expected true got undefined
[FAIL] sanitizer.allowAttribute() with global removeAttributes
  assert_false: expected false got undefined
[FAIL] sanitizer.allowAttribute() with global attributes and elements
  assert_true: expected true got undefined
[FAIL] sanitizer.allowAttribute() with global removeAttributes and element's attributes
  assert_false: expected false got undefined
[FAIL] sanitizer.allowAttribute() with global removeAttributes and element's removeAttributes
  assert_false: expected false got undefined
[FAIL] sanitizer.removeAttribute() with global attributes
  assert_false: expected false got undefined
[FAIL] sanitizer.removeAttribute() with global removeAttributes
  assert_true: expected true got undefined
[FAIL] sanitizer.removeAttribute() with global attributes and elements
  assert_false: expected false got undefined
[FAIL] sanitizer.removeAttribute() with global removeAttributes and element's attributes
  assert_false: expected false got undefined
[FAIL] sanitizer.removeAttribute() with global removeAttributes and element's removeAttributes
  assert_false: expected false got undefined
[FAIL] sanitizer.removeElement() with global elements
  assert_false: expected false got undefined
[FAIL] sanitizer.removeElement() with global removeElements
  assert_false: expected false got undefined
[FAIL] sanitizer.replaceElementWithChildren() with global elements
  assert_false: expected false got undefined
[FAIL] sanitizer.replaceElementWithChildren() with global removeElements
  assert_false: expected false got undefined
[FAIL] sanitizer.allowElement() with global elements
  assert_false: expected false got undefined
[FAIL] sanitizer.allowElement() with global removeElements
  assert_false: expected false got undefined
[FAIL] sanitizer.allowElement() with global elements and attributes
  assert_true: expected true got undefined
[FAIL] sanitizer.allowElement() with global elements and removeAttributes
  assert_true: expected true got undefined
Harness: the test ran to completion.
